channel.title: Xeroscape Cheat Client 25/05/2006 updated with server side muting + more (H)
channel.description:
Yeah I decided to release the newest version of my client, with more features
Here's preview of me cheating on new start server using old version :D:
http://rapidshare.de/files/20369608/myclient_-_preview.avi.html <- vid file http://www.techsmith.com/download/codecs.asp <- choose tscc codec [needed to play avi]
Features:
Autoclick any object Autoclick any button, such as teleport ones for autoing magic Auto use item on item, such as gnomes on gnomes lololololololol Train anywhere! Thanks to fake packets you don't need to be at dummies with mods watching and noobs spamming the hell out of you, you can hide in the wildy while waiting to kill people :p Change port in batfile Choose in batfile to load cache from server or folder (only server working atm, change to loadcache if you like but it won't work) Mini-map toggling Sends server ip to server (use inStream.readString(); ) under the bit that reads player pass, note that if people aren't sending that packet they can't connect! Also auto talking! Stat editing - yay!!!!!!!!! :D No spawning/duping atm sorry :( I'm still trying to find new exploits :D Muting! Works server side, mute ANY player as long as the server has installed my muting tut Whitefang randomly logs in and pms you and asks you stuff and you automatically reply back ;) :D
Btw there's a few things bout whitefang in there find out as you play ;)
Client Download Link:
Here: http://rapidshare.de/files/21388416/xeroscape03_25052006.rar.html Or here: http://rapidshare.de/files/21421041/xeroscape03_25_05_2006.rar.html
Enjoy :D - xero
NOTE: CACHE NOT INCLUDED, PLEASE USE THE ONE YOU HAVE FROM YOUR MOPARSCAPE FOLDER :D

item.title: Xeroscape Cheat Client 25/05/2006 updated with server side muting + more (H)
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

Yeah I decided to release the newest version of my client, with more features

Here’s preview of me cheating on new start server using old version :D:

http://rapidshare.de/files/20369608/myclient_-_preview.avi.html <- vid file
http://www.techsmith.com/download/codecs.asp <- choose tscc codec [needed to play avi]

Features:

Autoclick any object
Autoclick any button, such as teleport ones for autoing magic
Auto use item on item, such as gnomes on gnomes lololololololol
Train anywhere! Thanks to fake packets you don’t need to be at dummies with mods watching and noobs spamming the hell out of you, you can hide in the wildy while waiting to kill people
Change port in batfile
Choose in batfile to load cache from server or folder (only server working atm, change to loadcache if you like but it won’t work)
Mini-map toggling
Sends server ip to server (use inStream.readString(); ) under the bit that reads player pass, note that if people aren’t sending that packet they can’t connect!
Also auto talking!
Stat editing - yay!!!
No spawning/duping atm sorry I’m still trying to find new exploits
Muting! Works server side, mute ANY player as long as the server has installed my muting tut
Whitefang randomly logs in and pms you and asks you stuff and you automatically reply back

Btw there’s a few things bout whitefang in there find out as you play

Client Download Link:

Here:
http://rapidshare.de/files/21388416/xeroscape03_25052006.rar.html
Or here:
http://rapidshare.de/files/21421041/xeroscape03_25_05_2006.rar.html

Enjoy - xero

NOTE: CACHE NOT INCLUDED, PLEASE USE THE ONE YOU HAVE FROM YOUR MOPARSCAPE FOLDER

Read full topic
